DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of an investigational blood thinner, apixaban, in preventing venous thromboembolic (VTE) recurrence or death in patients with deep vein thrombosis (DVT) or pulmonary embolism (PE)
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of Apixaban for the Treatment of Deep Vein Thrombosis or Pulmonary Embolism
DOC.criteria: Men and women â‰¥ 18 years of age Clinical diagnosis of DVT or PE Contraindications for enoxaparin or warfarin Active bleeding or high risk for serious bleeding Short life expectancy Uncontrolled high blood pressure Significantly impaired kidney or liver function
